name: Banana girl
description:
As a kid, everyone had a dream, someone wanted to be a teacher, someone wanted to be a pilot, and someone wanted to be a scientist.

Our actress is a lovely little lolita. Her dream is to eat all kinds of food in the world.

Because of poor life, she can only get paid by working to buy the things she likes.

Game features:
  • Players need to operate a lovely little girl, and carry out a variety of transactions in the small town. After each completed a task, you can unlock the next task and discover the new scene, at the same time the story will continue.

  • Trading cards (soon)

Operation method:

1.Move the mouse or keyboard ↑ ↓ ← →: up, down, left, right.
2.Spacekey or Enter: OK
3.Esc: Menu and return.
